text: Interestingly , elevated IL - 6 was shown in the spinal cord but not brainstem or muscle of infected mice ( untreated group vs . isotypetreated group ) . Treatment of N3 effectively reduced the elevated IL - 6 expression in the spinal cord and even reduced the basal level of IL - 6 in the muscle ( Fig . 7C ) . These chemokines downregulated markedly in CNS and limb muscle indicated that treatment with N3 at an early stage of 5746 infection hindered viral - induced pathogenesis , and might affect the lymphocyte infiltration in the inflammatory tissues .
